Author: StephenFrysleftsock
Text: Not sure if everything on this site is low calorie, but [Minimalist Baker](https://minimalistbaker.com) has a tonne of recipes and a robust sorting menu that lets you search by vegan, oil-free, sugar-free, ease to make, ingredient, etc. I use it sometimes when I really want a vegan brownie and the recipes I’ve tried aren’t bad. There is also nutrition information (calories & macros) at the bottom of the recipe.

Author: jcsxx
Text: There are lots of subs like r/1200isplenty where I find my meals. I also follow a lot of the vegan recipes subs for ingredient ideas or baking recipes if I feel like I need to reduce the calories in something sweet (cause I also love to bake)
